_header: A little tale I will you tell / I trow it will like you well
_description: The Huntyng of the Hare — in 6-line stanzas

NLS1931.First Lines:
A letyll tale y wyll yow telly troye hit wyll lyke yow
                    well…
NLS1931.Last Lines:
…God gyff vs all gud endyngAnd hevon tyll owre
                    mede
